AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Column must be in AD_Table
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Table must be previously defined

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_DocType Journals
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Document Type Journal

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Client Security validation
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Clients with user access rights

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Org Security validation
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Organizations of the Client with user acces rights
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (@AD_Client_ID@='0' AND AD_Org.AD_Org_ID='0') OR (@AD_Client_ID@!='0' AND ((AD_Org.AD_Client_ID IN (@#User_Client@) AND AD_Org.AD_Org_ID IN (@#User_Org@)) OR AD_Org.AD_Org_ID='0' AND AD_Org.IsSummary='N'))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_User Security validation
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Users with access to organization

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_AcctSchema validation
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Validated AcctSchema (Client)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Reference Subreference
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Subreference validation choices

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Client Login
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Restrict to login client

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Org Login
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Restrict to Login Organization

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: GL_Category for Manual Journals
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Manual Journal GL Category

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_DocType GL Documents
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Document Type GL Document

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_DocType AR/AP Invoices and Credit Memos
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Document Type AR/AP Invoice and Credit Memos
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_DocType.DocBaseType IN ('ARI', 'API','ARC','APC','ARI_RM') AND C_DocType.IsSOTrx='@IsSOTrx@' AND (AD_ISORGINCLUDED(@AD_Org_ID@,C_DocType.AD_Org_ID, @#AD_Client_ID@) <> '-1' OR COALESCE(@AD_Org_ID@,'-1')='-1')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_DocType Material Shipments/Receipts
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Document Type Material Shipments and Receipts
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_DocType.DocBaseType IN ('MMR', 'MMS') AND C_DocType.IsSOTrx='@IsSOTrx@' AND AD_ISORGINCLUDED(@AD_Org_ID@,C_DocType.AD_Org_ID, @#AD_Client_ID@) <> '-1' AND (COALESCE(@isReturnMaterial@, 'N') = C_DocType.IsReturn OR COALESCE(@isDocumentTypeWindow@, 'N') = 'Y')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_DocType AR Pro Forma Invoices
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Document Type AR Pro Forma Invoice

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: M_PriceList Base
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Base Pricelists need to have same currency

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_DocType PO/SO
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Document Type for orders
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_DocType.DocBaseType IN ('SOO', 'POO') AND C_DocType.IsSOTrx='@IsSOTrx@' AND (AD_ISORGINCLUDED(@AD_Org_ID@,C_DocType.AD_Org_ID, @#AD_Client_ID@) <> '-1' OR COALESCE(@AD_Org_ID@,'-1')='-1') AND COALESCE(@isReturnMaterial@, 'N') = C_DocType.IsReturn AND ((@isQuotation@='Y' AND docsubtypeso like 'OB') OR ((@isQuotation@='N' OR @isQuotation@ is null) AND (docsubtypeso is null OR docsubtypeso not like 'OB')))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_Order SO to be invoiced
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Ordered <> Invoiced
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: IsSOTrx='Y' AND DocStatus NOT IN ('DR','IP') AND ((InvoiceRule = 'O' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM C_OrderLine WHERE C_Order.C_Order_ID=C_OrderLine.C_Order_ID AND QtyOrdered <> QtyDelivered) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM C_OrderLine WHERE C_Order.C_Order_ID=C_OrderLine.C_Order_ID AND QtyOrdered <> QtyInvoiced)) OR (InvoiceRule = 'D' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM C_OrderLine WHERE C_Order.C_Order_ID=C_OrderLine.C_Order_ID AND QtyOrdered <> QtyInvoiced AND QtyDelivered <> QtyInvoiced)) OR (InvoiceRule = 'I' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM C_OrderLine WHERE C_Order.C_Order_ID=C_OrderLine.C_Order_ID AND QtyOrdered <> QtyInvoiced)))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_BPartner w SO to invoice
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: BPartners with invoices to be invoiced
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM c_order o JOIN c_orderline ol ON (o.c_order_id = ol.c_order_id) WHERE o.issotrx = 'Y' AND o.c_bpartner_id = td0.c_bpartner_id AND o.docstatus NOT IN ( 'DR', 'IP', 'CL' ) AND obequals(ol.qtyordered, ol.qtyinvoiced) = 'N' AND ( ( o.invoicerule = 'O' AND obequals(ol.qtyordered, ol.qtydelivered) = 'Y') OR ( o.invoicerule IN ( 'D', 'S' ) AND obequals(ol.qtydelivered, ol.qtyinvoiced) = 'N' ) OR ( o.invoicerule = 'I') ))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Find Column
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Columns of Table

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_Accounts
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: based on C_AcctSchema_ID
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EXISTS (SELECT * FROM C_AcctSchema_Element ae WHERE C_ElementValue.C_Element_ID=ae.C_Element_ID AND ae.ElementType='AC' AND ae.C_AcctSchema_ID=@C_AcctSchema_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_Accounts User1
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: based on C_AcctSchema_ID
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EXISTS (SELECT * FROM C_AcctSchema_Element ae WHERE C_ElementValue.C_Element_ID=ae.C_Element_ID AND ae.ElementType='U1' AND ae.C_AcctSchema_ID=@C_AcctSchema_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_Accounts User2
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: based on C_AcctSchema_ID
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EXISTS (SELECT * FROM C_AcctSchema_Element ae WHERE C_ElementValue.C_Element_ID=ae.C_Element_ID AND ae.ElementType='U2' AND ae.C_AcctSchema_ID=@C_AcctSchema_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Tree Menu
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Only menu items

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_Payment not in BankStatement
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM C_BankStatementLine l WHERE l.C_Payment_ID=C_Payment.C_Payment_ID)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Tree Element Value
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Only Element Value items

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_User - Internal
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Employees & Sales Reps
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EXISTS (SELECT * FROM C_BPartner bp WHERE AD_User.C_BPartner_ID=bp.C_BPartner_ID AND (bp.IsEmployee='Y' OR bp.IsSalesRep='Y'))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_DocType Orders
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Document Tpe for SO/PO

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_DocType Invoices and Credit Memos
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Document Type AR/AP Invoice and Credit Memos

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: M_InOut Receipts of Project
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (M_InOut.C_Project_ID IS NULL OR M_InOut.C_Project_ID=@C_Project_ID@) AND M_InOut.Processed='Y' AND M_InOut.IsSOTrx='N'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_Project based on status and bpartner
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Project.projectstatus in ('OP', 'OR') and (C_Project.c_bpartner_id=@C_BPartner_ID@ or '@IsSOTrx@'='N') or C_Project.c_project_id = @c_project_id@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: MA_Sequence in process plan
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: MA_Sequence.MA_Processplan_Version_ID IN (SELECT MA_Processplan_Version_ID FROM MA_Processplan_Version WHERE MA_Processplan_Id=@MA_Processplan_ID@ AND datefrom <= TO_DATE(@Launchdate@) and dateto>TO_DATE(@Launchdate@))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_Period_ID of selected year
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Period.C_Year_ID IN (SELECT C_Budget.C_Year_ID FROM C_Budget WHERE C_Budget.C_Budget_ID = @C_Budget_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: S_Expense product type
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: PRODUCTTYPE = (CASE WHEN @ISTIMEREPORT@ IS NULL THEN 'E' WHEN @ISTIMEREPORT@='Y' THEN 'S' ELSE 'E' END) AND isgeneric = 'N'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Org forced
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Filter by a defined Organization as an input AD_Org_Forced

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: MA_Machine not included
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Only lets choose machines not inlcuded on the table.
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MA_MachineStation ms WHERE ms.MA_WorkStation_ID = @MA_WorkStation_ID@ AND ms.MA_Machine_ID = MA_Machine.MA_Machine_ID )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_Uom not as product_uom
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM M_Product_UOM pu WHERE pu.M_Product_ID = @M_Product_ID@ AND pu.C_UOM_ID = td0.C_UOM_ID AND pu.M_Product_UOM_ID <>@M_Product_UOM_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_User Alert
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Restrict users to role in alerts
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_User.AD_User_ID in (select AD_User_ID from AD_User_Roles where @AD_Role_Id@=AD_Role_ID)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Role_of_User
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Filter User's Role
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM AD_USER_ROLES A_U_R WHERE A_U_R.AD_ROLE_ID = AD_Role.AD_Role_ID AND A_U_R.ISACTIVE = 'Y' AND A_U_R.AD_USER_ID = @AD_User_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Client of Role
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Filter Role's Clients
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_CLIENT.ISACTIVE = 'Y' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM AD_ROLE_ORGACCESS WHERE AD_ROLE_ORGACCESS.AD_CLIENT_ID = AD_CLIENT.AD_CLIENT_ID AND AD_ROLE_ORGACCESS.AD_ROLE_ID = @Default_AD_Role_ID@ AND AD_ROLE_ORGACCESS.ISACTIVE = 'Y')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Org of a Role
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Filter Organization by Role
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM AD_ROLE_ORGACCESS A_R_O, ad_role r WHERE A_R_O.AD_ORG_ID = AD_ORG.AD_Org_ID AND A_R_O.ISACTIVE = 'Y' AND A_R_O.AD_ROLE_ID = R.AD_ROLE_ID and r.ad_role_id = @Default_AD_Role_ID@ AND R.ISACTIVE = 'Y' AND (LPAD(TO_CHAR(R.USERLEVEL), 1, '1')='S' OR AD_ORG.AD_ORG_ID <> '0') AND A_R_O.AD_ROLE_ID = @Default_AD_Role_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: M_Warehouse of Role
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Filter Warehouse filter by Role

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Not discarded toolsets in Work Effort
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Validation to filter the toolset by their type and status
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: MA_Toolset.Discarded = 'N' AND MA_Toolset.MA_Toolset_Type_ID IN (SELECT MA_Toolset_Type_ID FROM MA_ToolsetProcess, MA_WRPhase, M_ProductionPlan WHERE M_ProductionPlan.M_ProductionPlan_ID = @M_ProductionPlan_ID@ AND M_ProductionPlan.MA_WRPhase_ID = MA_WRPhase.MA_WRPhase_ID AND MA_WRPhase.MA_Process_ID = MA_ToolsetProcess.MA_Process_ID)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Invoice Rules for POS Sales orders
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Filters the possible Invoice Rules whein is selected the POS Sales order document.
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (AD_Ref_List.value IN ('I', 'D', 'O') OR (SELECT DOCSUBTYPESO FROM C_DOCTYPE WHERE C_DOCTYPE.C_DOCTYPE_ID = @C_DOCTYPETARGET_ID@) <> 'WR')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Current acctschema
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: For current acctschema
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM C_ACCTSCHEMA_ELEMENT WHERE C_ACCTSCHEMA_ELEMENT.ELEMENTTYPE='AC' AND C_ACCTSCHEMA_ELEMENT.C_ELEMENT_ID=C_ELEMENTVALUE.C_ELEMENT_ID AND C_ACCTSCHEMA_ELEMENT.C_Acctschema_ID=@C_Acctschema_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_ImpFormat combo validation
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Restricts copying lines of a File Format to itself

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_TAX - C_TAXREGISTER_TYPE_LINES
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_TAX.SOPOTYPE<>(SELECT CASE WHEN ISSOTRX='Y' THEN 'P' ELSE 'S' END FROM C_TAXREGISTER_TYPE WHERE C_TAXREGISTER_TYPE_ID=@C_TAXREGISTER_TYPE_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: DocBaseType - Invoices
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_DOCTYPE.DOCBASETYPE IN ('ARI', 'ARC', 'API', 'APC','ARI_RM') AND C_DOCTYPE.ISSOTRX = (SELECT ISSOTRX FROM C_TAXREGISTER_TYPE WHERE C_TAXREGISTER_TYPE_ID=@C_TAXREGISTER_TYPE_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_Currency of PriceList
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Sets the currency of the pricelist
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Currency.C_Currency_ID IN (SELECT C_Currency_ID FROM M_Pricelist WHERE ISACTIVE='Y')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Purchase Pricelist
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Purchase Pricelist

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_AcctSchema_Table DocBaseType
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Doc base type of the selected document
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Value IN (SELECT DOCBASETYPE FROM C_DOCTYPE, C_ACCTSCHEMA_TABLE WHERE C_DOCTYPE.AD_TABLE_ID = C_ACCTSCHEMA_TABLE.AD_TABLE_ID AND C_ACCTSCHEMA_TABLE.C_ACCTSCHEMA_TABLE_ID = @C_Acctschema_Table_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: M_BOM_ISVERIFIED
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Chek if the BOM is verified

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Org Legal Entity
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Only Legal Entities
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: exists (select 1 from ad_orgtype where ad_orgtype.ad_orgtype_id = ad_org.ad_orgtype_id and islegalentity='Y') AND IsReady='Y'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Values for Invoice Rules for POS Sales orders
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Filters the possible Invoice Rules whein is selected the POS Sales order document.

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: M_Reservation Allowed Actions
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ((@res_status@ = 'DR' AND value IN ('PR')) OR (@res_status@ = 'CO' AND value IN ('HO', 'RE', 'CL')) OR (@res_status@ = 'HO' AND value IN ('UNHO', 'CL')) OR (@res_status@ = 'CL' AND value IN ('--')) )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_DocType - Bank Statement File
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: C_DocType - Bank Statement File Validation

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_UOM Validation
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (td0.uom_type is null or td0.uom_type in (select c.uom_type from c_uom c where c.c_uom_id = @C_Uom_ID@)) and td0.c_uom_id <> @C_UOM_ID@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: M_Ch_Subset_Value not exist
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Only values not already included in the subset
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM m_ch_subset_value chsv WHERE chsv.m_ch_subset_id = @M_Ch_Subset_ID@ AND chsv.m_ch_value_id = m_ch_value.m_ch_value_id)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Price List Version IsSotrx
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Price List Version IsSotrx
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: M_PriceList_version_id in (select M_PriceList_version_id from M_PriceList_version lv left join M_PriceList l on l.M_PriceList_id = lv.M_PriceList_id where l.issopricelist = @isSOTrx@ and ad_isorgincluded(@AD_ORG_ID@,l.ad_org_id,@AD_CLIENT_ID@) <> -1)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: ad_sequence columns
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: This validation is used to filter the sequence columns

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_Tax IsSOTrx
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Validate tax depending on is Sales or Purchase transaction
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (C_TAX.SOPOTYPE =(CASE WHEN @IsSOTrx@ = 'Y' THEN 'S' ELSE 'P' END) OR C_TAX.SOPOTYPE = 'B') AND C_TAX.AD_CLIENT_ID=@AD_CLIENT_ID@ AND AD_ISORGINCLUDED(@AD_ORG_ID@, C_TAX.AD_ORG_ID, @#AD_Client_ID@) <> '-1' AND C_TAX.C_TAXCATEGORY_ID = (SELECT C_TAXCATEGORY_ID FROM M_PRODUCT WHERE M_PRODUCT_ID=@M_PRODUCT_ID@) AND C_TAX.C_TAX_ID=(CASE WHEN @IsSOTrx@ = 'Y' AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM AD_ORGINFO WHERE ISTAXUNDEDUCTABLE='Y' AND AD_ORG_ID=@AD_ORG_ID@) THEN (SELECT C_TAX_ID FROM AD_ORGINFO WHERE ISTAXUNDEDUCTABLE='Y' AND AD_ORG_ID=@AD_ORG_ID@) ELSE C_TAX.C_TAX_ID END)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Financial Account - Customer
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Fin_Financial_Account_ID IN (SELECT Fin_Financial_Account_ID FROM Fin_Finacc_Paymentmethod WHERE Fin_Paymentmethod_ID=@Fin_Paymentmethod_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Business Partner Withholding
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Show the Withholdings which belong to the Business Partner
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM C_BP_Withholding w , C_BPartner b WHERE w.C_BPartner_ID=b.C_BPartner_ID AND w.C_Withholding_ID=C_Withholding.C_Withholding_ID AND W.C_BPartner_ID=@C_BPartner_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: FIN_PaymentMethodsWithAccount
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Filters only the payment methods that belong to a financial account

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Only current referenced inventory bin or all bins if empty
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Show the valid bin to for boxing a referenced inventory. If not empty the bin to is restricted to current one.

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Module_Dependecy_ID Avoid dependency to itsef
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: AD_Module_Dependecy_ID Avoid dependency to itsef

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Org show batch's child organizations
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: It only shows the child organizations of the organization of the batch.
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (AD_ISORGINCLUDED(ad_org.ad_org_id, @Batch_Org@, ad_org.ad_client_id)<>-1 AND IsReady='Y') or @Batch_Org@ is null

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Org (without *)
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Organization selection without *

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_OrgType_BU_LE
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Only Business Units or Legal Entities are displayed
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: exists (select 1 from ad_orgtype where ad_orgtype.ad_orgtype_id = ad_org.ad_orgtype_id and (islegalentity='Y' or isbusinessunit='Y')) AND IsReady='Y'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: DocType Not A Credit Memo
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: DocType that is not a Credit Memo

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: System role if module
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: If a module is selected, show only system role
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: @AD_Module_ID@ is null or (@AD_Module_ID@ is not null and AD_Role_ID='0')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Org show child organizations
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: It only shows the child organizations of the organization's header
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_ISORGINCLUDED(ad_org.ad_org_id, CASE WHEN (@Parent_AD_Org@ IS NULL OR @Parent_AD_Org@ = '') THEN @AD_ORG_ID@ ELSE @Parent_AD_Org@ END, ad_org.ad_client_id)<>-1 AND IsReady='Y'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Template roles with same access level
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Template roles with same access level

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Org In product costing tab
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Validation to be used in organization field in product window in costing tab. This validation it is different if the instance is migrated to new costing engine or not.
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: IsReady='Y' AND ad_org_isinnaturaltree(ad_org_id, @Parent_AD_Org@, ad_client_id) ='Y' AND exists (select 1 from ad_orgtype where ad_orgtype.ad_orgtype_id = ad_org.ad_orgtype_id and islegalentity='Y')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Financial Invoices GL Items
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: It is allowing only gl items that have enabled for financial invoice lines.

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: UOM Validation
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: td0.c_uom_id IN(select p.c_uom_id from m_product p where p.m_product_id = @M_Product_ID@) or td0.c_uom_id IN(select a.c_uom_id from m_product_aum a where a.m_product_id = @M_Product_ID@ and ((@IsSOTrx@ = 'Y' and a.sales <> 'NA') OR (@IsSOTrx@ <> 'Y' and a.purchase <> 'NA')))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Invoice Terms used in Orders Awaiting Invoice report
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Invoice Terms used in the Orders Awaiting Invoice report,with Do Not Invoice value removed.

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_Tax_IsSOTrx_Date
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_TAX.VALIDFROM<=COALESCE(@DateInvoiced@,@DateOrdered@) AND (C_TAX.SOPOTYPE =(CASE WHEN @IsSOTrx@ = 'Y' THEN 'S' ELSE 'P' END) OR C_TAX.SOPOTYPE = 'B') AND C_TAX.AD_CLIENT_ID=@AD_CLIENT_ID@ AND C_TAX.C_TAX_ID=(CASE WHEN @IsSOTrx@ = 'Y' AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM AD_ORGINFO WHERE ISTAXUNDEDUCTABLE='Y' AND AD_ORG_ID=@AD_ORG_ID@) THEN (SELECT C_TAX_ID FROM AD_ORGINFO WHERE ISTAXUNDEDUCTABLE='Y' AND AD_ORG_ID=@AD_ORG_ID@) ELSE C_TAX.C_TAX_ID END)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Document Type filter according to table
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Doctype.AD_Table_ID = @AD_Table_ID@ AND ( AD_ISORGINCLUDED(@AD_Org_ID@, td0.AD_Org_ID, @#AD_Client_ID@) <> '-1' OR AD_ISORGINCLUDED( td0.AD_Org_ID, @AD_Org_ID@, @#AD_Client_ID@) <> '-1' )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: System client if module
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: If a module is selected, show only system client
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: @AD_Module_ID@ is null or (@AD_Module_ID@ is not null and AD_Client_ID = '0')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Accounting Dimensions for selected docbasetype
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Filters dimensions which are not present for the selected docbasetype
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: exists (select 1 from ad_dimension_mapping where docbasetype= @DOCBASETYPE@ and dimension = value)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Validation in Columns
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: SQL validations

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Fin_FinancialAccountofPaymentMethod
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Fin_Financial_Account_ID IN (SELECT Fin_Financial_Account_ID FROM Fin_Finacc_Paymentmethod WHERE Fin_Paymentmethod_ID=@Fin_Paymentmethod_ID@ AND (CASE WHEN @IsReceipt@='Y' THEN Payin_Allow ELSE Payout_Allow END)='Y' AND isActive='Y')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: DocBaseType dimension enabling
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: exists (select 1 from ad_dimension_mapping where docbasetype = value)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Settlement that cancels this payment
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Settlement that cancels this payment

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_User - Org Tree
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Filters AD_User by natural tree organizations

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Org child orgs any table
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Filters the rows to show only those in that belong to child organizations of the organization of the record.

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Order Line type For Manufacturing Plan line
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: td1.ISSOTRX=(SELECT CASE WHEN @INOUTTRXTYPE@='PO' OR @INOUTTRXTYPE@='PP' THEN 'N' WHEN @INOUTTRXTYPE@='SO' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'NA' END ) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM C_DocType WHERE td1.C_DocType_ID = C_DocType_ID AND (DOCSUBTYPESO <> 'OB' OR DOCSUBTYPESO IS NULL))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Package_ID IsInDevelopment
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: AD_Package_ID IsInDevelopment
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ad_module_id in (select ad_module_id from ad_module where IsInDevelopment = 'Y')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: FIN_Payment status for transactons
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Payment status used as transaction status in financila account

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_AcctSchema - Schemas matching parent organizations
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM AD_ORG_ACCTSCHEMA WHERE AD_ORG_ACCTSCHEMA.C_ACCTSCHEMA_ID = C_ACCTSCHEMA.C_ACCTSCHEMA_ID AND AD_ISORGINCLUDED(@AD_Org_ID@, AD_ORG_ID, AD_CLIENT_ID)<>-1)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Org any table by parent organization
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Filter a drop down to show only records of the organization or of parent organizations, based on the organization of the record that it is being edited.

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_DataSet_Table access level
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Filters tables removing views and taking into account access level
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ad_table.isView='N' and ((ad_table.accesslevel in ('3','1','7') and exists(select 1 from ad_dataset where ad_dataset_id = @AD_DATASET_ID@ and ad_dataset.accesslevel = '1')) OR (ad_table.accesslevel in ('4','6','7') and exists(select 1 from ad_dataset where ad_dataset_id = @AD_DATASET_ID@ and ad_dataset.accesslevel = '4')) OR (ad_table.accesslevel in ('6','3','7') and exists(select 1 from ad_dataset where ad_dataset_id = @AD_DATASET_ID@ and ad_dataset.accesslevel = '6')) OR (ad_table.accesslevel in ('3','7') and exists(select 1 from ad_dataset where ad_dataset_id = @AD_DATASET_ID@ and ad_dataset.accesslevel = '3')) )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Return reason RFC/RTV
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (C_RETURN_REASON.ISRFC = @ISSOTRX@ OR C_RETURN_REASON.ISRTV=(case when @ISSOTRX@='N' then 'Y' else 'N' end))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: M_Characteristic in Product
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: m_characteristic_id IN (SELECT m_characteristic_id FROM m_product_ch WHERE m_product_id = @m_product_id@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: DocType For Document Cancelled
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_DocType.isreversal || C_DocType.docbasetype = (select isreversal || docbasetype from c_doctype where c_doctype_id = @C_DocType_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_COLUMN filtered by sequence field
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_COLUMN_ID in (SELECT AD_COLUMN_ID FROM AD_COLUMN WHERE ad_reference_id in('4148378344A04A50AC7AED3B05F34B4D','B82E1C56F57749AD97DD9924624F08D3') and ad_column.ad_table_id = @AD_Table_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_Tax - Base taxes
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Base taxes previously calculated

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Records belonging to any org declared in the role
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Records that belong to any organization where the current logged in role has access to. If the role's user level contains Client, we include also records for * organization
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM AD_ROLE_ORGACCESS A_R_O INNER JOIN ad_role r ON (A_R_O.AD_ROLE_ID = r.AD_ROLE_ID) WHERE A_R_O.ISACTIVE = 'Y' AND r.ISACTIVE = 'Y' and r.ad_role_id = @#AD_Role_ID@ AND (A_R_O.AD_ORG_ID = td0.AD_Org_ID OR (SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(r.USERLEVEL), 2, 1) = 'C' AND td0.AD_ORG_ID = '0') ) )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Org show GL_Header child organizations
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (AD_ISORGINCLUDED(ad_org.ad_org_id, @Batch_Org@, ad_org.ad_client_id)<>-1 AND IsReady='Y') or AD_ISORGINCLUDED(ad_org.ad_org_id, @Journal_Org@, ad_org.ad_client_id)<>-1 AND IsReady='Y'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Field of a tab
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Fields of a tab

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Status - Exclude In Remittance
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Excludes in remittance option for Create from bank popup

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: SalesTaxExemptRate
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (C_TAX.SOPOTYPE = 'S' OR C_TAX.SOPOTYPE = 'B') AND C_TAX.ISTAXEXEMPT = 'Y' AND C_TAX.AD_CLIENT_ID=@AD_CLIENT_ID@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: System user if module
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: If a module is selected, show only system user
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: @AD_Module_ID@ is null or (@AD_Module_ID@ is not null and AD_User_ID = '0')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_DocType - Payment Proposal
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_DocType.DocBaseType IN ('APPP', 'ARRP') AND C_DocType.IsSOTrx='@FIN_Isreceipt@' AND AD_ISORGINCLUDED(@AD_Org_ID@,C_DocType.AD_Org_ID, @#AD_Client_ID@) <> '-1' AND C_DocType.AD_Client_ID=@#AD_Client_ID@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Ad_Module_ID IsInDevelopment & has Reference Data
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: The module is "in development" and "has Reference Data".

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_DocType - Reconciliation
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: C_DocType - Reconciliation Validation

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: FIN_Payment Status validation
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Filter status in sales and purchase.
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (((@Isreceipt@='Y') AND Value not IN ('PPM','PWNC')) OR ((@Isreceipt@='N') AND Value not IN ('RPR','RDNC')))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Org IsPeriodControlAllowed
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Display the organizations which are allowed to open/close period control

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_TABLE filtered by sequence reference column
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_TABLE_ID in (SELECT adtable.AD_TABLE_ID FROM AD_TABLE adtable WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM AD_COLUMN adcolumn WHERE adcolumn.ad_table_id =adtable.ad_table_id and adcolumn.ad_reference_id in('4148378344A04A50AC7AED3B05F34B4D','B82E1C56F57749AD97DD9924624F08D3')))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: M_Warehouse on hand
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: m_warehouse.m_warehouse_id in (select m_warehouse_id from ad_org_warehouse where ad_org_warehouse.ad_org_id=@AD_Org_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Ad_Module_ID IsInDevelopment
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: AD_Module_ID IsInDevelopment

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_User - login users
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: AD_User with username not empty (login users)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: M_Internal_Consumption valid actions
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ((@Status@ = 'DR' AND AD_Ref_List.value='CO') OR (@Status@ = 'CO' AND AD_Ref_List.value IN ('VO')))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_Calendar and C_Year of an organization
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: It ensures the calendar combobox shows always the calendar of the selected organization
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_YEAR.C_CALENDAR_ID IN (SELECT AD_InheritedCalendar_ID FROM AD_ORG WHERE AD_Client_ID= @AD_Client_ID@ AND AD_ORG_ID= @AD_Org_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Allowed PeriodActions
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Display only the allowed PeriodActions

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Accounting Dimensions
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: List of accounting dimensions that are configurable from Client window

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Document Type for Invoice
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_DocType.DocBaseType IN ('ARI', 'API', 'ARI_RM') AND C_DocType.IsSOTrx='@IsSOTrx@' AND (AD_ISORGINCLUDED(@AD_Org_ID@,C_DocType.AD_Org_ID, @#AD_Client_ID@) <> '-1' OR COALESCE(@AD_Org_ID@,'-1')='-1')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Legal entities and their child organizations
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: exists (select 1 from ad_org o join ad_orgtype ot on o.ad_orgtype_id = ot.ad_orgtype_id where ad_isorgincluded(ad_org.ad_org_id, o.ad_org_id, ad_org.ad_client_id) <> -1 and ot.islegalentity = 'Y')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Settlement that generates this payment
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Settlement that generates this payment

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Org of logged Role
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Filter Organization by logged Role
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM AD_ROLE_ORGACCESS A_R_O, ad_role r WHERE A_R_O.AD_ORG_ID = AD_ORG.AD_Org_ID AND A_R_O.ISACTIVE = 'Y' AND A_R_O.AD_ROLE_ID = R.AD_ROLE_ID and r.ad_role_id = @#AD_Role_ID@ AND R.ISACTIVE = 'Y' AND (LPAD(TO_CHAR(R.USERLEVEL), 1, '1')='S' OR AD_ORG.AD_ORG_ID <> '0') AND A_R_O.AD_ROLE_ID = @#AD_Role_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Available UOM's for Product for Logistics flow
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (exists(select 1 from m_product p where p.m_product_id = @M_Product_ID@ and p.c_uom_id = td0.c_uom_id) or exists(select 1 from m_product_aum a where a.m_product_id = @M_Product_ID@ and a.logistics <> 'NA' and a.c_uom_id = td0.c_uom_id))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Price List isSOTrx
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: This validation forces the field to show only the type of pricelist that suits to the window, concerning wether it is a sales or a purchase window.

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: UsersWithRequisition
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Users that has Requisition

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Currency of Financial Account
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: c_currency.c_currency_id in (select c_currency_id from fin_financial_account where fin_financial_account_id = @FIN_Financial_Account_ID@) OR exists (select 1 from fin_finacc_paymentmethod where fin_financial_account_id = @FIN_Financial_Account_ID@ and fin_paymentmethod_id = @FIN_PaymentMethod_ID@ and isactive='Y' and ( (@IsReceipt@ = 'Y' and payin_allow ='Y' and payin_ismulticurrency='Y') OR (@IsReceipt@ = 'N' and payout_allow ='Y' and payout_ismulticurrency='Y') ))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_Period - Org Calendar Period
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: exists (select 1 from c_year where c_period.c_year_id = c_year.c_year_id and (SELECT AD_InheritedCalendar_ID FROM AD_ORG WHERE AD_Client_ID= @AD_Client_ID@ AND AD_ORG_ID= @AD_Org_ID@) = c_year.c_calendar_id) and periodtype = 'S'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Language_System
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: List of the Etendo ERP System Languages

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_AllFieldsOfATab
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: All Fields of Tab

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Validation for Reference parameters in Process Definition
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Validation for Reference parameters in Process Definition: NOT button reference

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: System org if module
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: If a module is selected, show only system org
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: @AD_Module_ID@ is null or (@AD_Module_ID@ is not null and AD_Org_ID = '0')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Financial Account - Vendor
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Fin_Financial_Account_ID IN (SELECT Fin_Financial_Account_ID FROM Fin_Finacc_Paymentmethod WHERE Fin_Paymentmethod_ID=@PO_Paymentmethod_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: M_Ch_Value of a M_Product_CH
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: m_ch_value.m_characteristic_id = (SELECT m_characteristic_id FROM m_product_ch WHERE m_product_ch_id = @M_Product_Ch_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: DocType Doubtful Debt Validation
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: DocType Doubtful Debt Validation
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_DocType.DocBaseType IN ('DDB') AND C_DocType.IsSOTrx='@IsSOTrx@' AND (AD_ISORGINCLUDED(@AD_Org_ID@,C_DocType.AD_Org_ID, @#AD_Client_ID@) <> '-1' OR COALESCE(@AD_Org_ID@,'-1')='-1')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Org is transactions allowed
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Display the ready organizations where transactions are allowed
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ad_orgtype WHERE ad_orgtype.ad_orgtype_id=ad_org.ad_orgtype_id AND IsTransactionsAllowed='Y') and IsReady='Y'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Service Price Rule Type for Ranges
FIN_PaymentMethodsWithAccountIsSOTrxControl
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Filters only the payment methods that belong to a financial account taking in account payment in / out allowed flags
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM FIN_FinAcc_PaymentMethod fapm WHERE FIN_PaymentMethod.FIN_PaymentMethod_ID=fapm.FIN_PaymentMethod_ID AND fapm.Payin_Allow = (SELECT CASE WHEN '@IsSOTrx@'='Y' THEN 'Y' ELSE fapm.Payin_Allow END FROM DUAL) AND fapm.Payout_Allow = (SELECT CASE WHEN '@IsSOTrx@'='N' THEN 'Y' ELSE fapm.Payout_Allow END FROM DUAL))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: FIN_PaymentMethodsWithAccountIsReceiptControl
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Filters only the payment methods that belong to a financial account taking in account payment in / out allowed flags
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM FIN_FinAcc_PaymentMethod fapm WHERE FIN_PaymentMethod.FIN_PaymentMethod_ID=fapm.FIN_PaymentMethod_ID AND fapm.isActive='Y' AND fapm.Payin_Allow = (SELECT CASE WHEN '@FIN_ISRECEIPT@'='Y' THEN 'Y' ELSE fapm.Payin_Allow END FROM DUAL) AND fapm.Payout_Allow = (SELECT CASE WHEN '@FIN_ISRECEIPT@'='N' THEN 'Y' ELSE fapm.Payout_Allow END FROM DUAL))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_AcctSchema - Schemas matching parent & child organizations
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM AD_ORG_ACCTSCHEMA WHERE AD_ORG_ACCTSCHEMA.C_ACCTSCHEMA_ID = C_ACCTSCHEMA.C_ACCTSCHEMA_ID AND (AD_ISORGINCLUDED(@AD_Org_ID@, AD_ORG_ID, AD_CLIENT_ID)<>-1 OR AD_ISORGINCLUDED(AD_Org_ID, @AD_Org_ID@, AD_CLIENT_ID)<>-1))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Document currency
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Currency.C_Currency_id = CASE WHEN @C_Invoice_ID@ is not null THEN (SELECT C_Currency_ID FROM C_Invoice WHERE C_Invoice_ID = COALESCE(@C_Invoice_ID@,'---')) WHEN @APRM_Finacc_Transaction_V_ID@ is not null THEN (SELECT c_currency_id FROM aprm_finacc_transaction_v WHERE aprm_finacc_transaction_v_id = COALESCE(@APRM_Finacc_Transaction_V_ID@, '---')) WHEN @FIN_Finacc_Transaction_ID@ is not null THEN (SELECT c_currency_id FROM fin_finacc_transaction WHERE fin_finacc_transaction_id = COALESCE(@FIN_Finacc_Transaction_ID@, '---')) WHEN @GL_Journal_ID@ is not null THEN (SELECT c_currency_id FROM gl_journal WHERE gl_journal_id = COALESCE(@GL_Journal_ID@, '---')) ELSE (SELECT C_Currency_ID FROM FIN_Payment WHERE FIN_Payment_ID = COALESCE(@FIN_Payment_ID@, '---')) END

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_DocType Work Requirement
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: C_DocType Work Requirement
